message.body: Bill - today won't work, but I can do tomorrow around 12 or 12:30 at the latest as I have a 1:00 meeting.
I am set for today (wife found the case). My 1:00 meeting may be canceled in which case we could meet at 1. I will let you know soon.
I do have the meeting so are we on for 12:30?
I could be there at 12 if youd rather. I drive a white Prius and wear a blue jacket. Just leave a bit of
Time to show me Kindle in whole foods. Thx. Bill
Okay sounds good. I will shoot for Noon. I drive a Black Toyota Tacoma wearing gray and black jacket. Do you want to meet in whole foods or parking lot?
Just arrived. At table in cafe.
